EmailTemplate.name: 07/01/2013 Closure of Uniform Shop
EmailTemplate.subject: Closure of Uniform Shop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
I trust this finds you all well.
Please note that the school Uniform Shop will be closed this week on Wednesday 8th January and Thursday 9th January.
We are sorry for any inconvenience this may cause.
The shop will be open on Friday 10th January as normal.
Thank you and warm regards,
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
